author: aandvalenzuela
body:
@smuzaffar I followed the same pattern that we are currently using for aarch64, but I can also explicitly grep for the failing tests:
```
23234.0_TTbar_14TeV+2026D94 | Step1-FAILED
24834.0_TTbar_14TeV+2026D98 | Step1-FAILED
24834.911_TTbar_14TeV+2026D98_DD4hep | Step1-FAILED
24896.0_CloseByPGun_CE_E_Front_120um+2026D98 | Step1-FAILED
24900.0_CloseByPGun_CE_H_Coarse_Scint+2026D98 | Step1-FAILED
25034.999_TTbar_14TeV+2026D98PU_PMXS1S2PR | Step2-FAILED
```
title: Skip known relval failures in ppc64le for test-os jobs
